structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
FINANCE AND REVENUE OF CITIES OF THE FIRST CLASS

law.catch_line: City may hold, sell, transfer, lease, or use real estate purchased at a commissioner's sale.
law.text: Any property or real estate acquired by the city by virtue of purchase at the commissioner's sale shall be held by the city and any property so held may be sold, transferred, leased or otherwise utilized by the city within its sole discretion.
law.history: Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 47, sec. 15, effective July 15, 1980.
